name: Blokin
description: Blokin is a minimalist puzzle game with cute-as-hell inhabitants that are as dense as a Neutron star! Where they're lacking in smarts, you clearly are not and have come to save the day. Use your super-smarts and logical thinking to help the bumbling Blokin folk to reach their goal.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c Storage: 680 MB available space Sound Card: Any
